com.baristamatic.drink.menu
Class SingleBaristaDrinkMenu

java.lang.Object
  com.baristamatic.drink.menu.SingleBaristaDrinkMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
public class SingleBaristaDrinkMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements Menu

This class creates a single reusable menu of featured drinks for the Baristamatic Simulator application.

Version:
1.0, 09/14/11, 1.1, 09/15/11
Author:
Tom Stewart 
seasonedgeek@mac.com
